common.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
common.forbidden: You do not have permission to perform this action.
common.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
common.conflict: The request could not be processed because of a conflict.
common.internal: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
